references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a core technique used in the authors' proposed model for stochastic residual modeling.

references.paper_title: Swinir: Image restoration using swin transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces the Swin Transformer based image restoration method, which is used by the authors as one of the baseline models for comparison against their proposed method.
This paper introduces a video restoration transformer, another baseline model for the proposed method, showing how the authors' approach improves upon existing techniques for video super-resolution.

references.paper_title: U-net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation
references.reason: This is a foundational paper describing the U-Net architecture, which the authors adapt for their spatio-temporal modeling and combines with diffusion models for improved precipitation downscaling.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the progressive distillation technique used by the authors to enhance the efficiency of sampling from their conditional diffusion model, leading to improved performance in precipitation downscaling.
